title: Death Sworn Skins
body: I just wanted to know when the Death Sworn skins are coming back because i didn't have money to buy the skin but i have the money now and wanted to know when they are coming back?

replies.body:
Like MysticLlamaZ said, they will come back in halloween.
However you still have the chance of getting them through the hextech crafting system _(albeit a very small chance)_.
